content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) refueled with coal, extracting coal.
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) with no ingredients to smelt.
- Iron Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) storing coal.
- Iron Chest at position (42.5, -80.5) storing coal.
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) transferring items between chests and furnace.
- Additional Iron Chests at positions (45.5, -80.5), (47.5, -80.5), and (49.5, -80.5) storing coal and iron plates.
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5) storing coal.
- Burner Inserter at position (41.5, -78.5) waiting for source items.

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) refueled with coal, extracting iron ore.
- Iron Chest at position (-16.5, -48.5) storing iron ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) storing iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) processing iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone Furnace at position (-11.0, -48.0) processing iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone Furnace at position (-9.0, -48.0) processing iron ore into iron plates.
- Wooden Chests at positions (-12.5, -49.5) and (-9.5, -49.5) storing iron ore.
- Iron Chest at position (-14.5, -47.5) empty.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Supplying Iron Ore to Furnaces
- Ensure that there is sufficient iron ore in the inventory before attempting to supply it to the furnaces at positions (-13.0, -48.0), (-11.0, -48.0), and (-9.0, -48.0).

### Errors when Placing Entities
- Ensure that there is enough inventory of the required entity type before attempting to place it. For example, ensure iron chests are in inventory before placing them.
- Check for existing objects at the target location before placing new entities to avoid placement failures.

### Errors when Extracting or Transferring Resources
- Ensure that the source inventory has the required resources before attempting to transfer or extract them to avoid extraction failures.
